data.title: PIX: George Clooney's MOST FAMOUS Girlfriends
data.meta_description: George Clooney's much talked about bachelor life has seen many pretty faces tumble in and out of it. Until Amal Alamuddin came along and hooked him for good.
data.text:
George Clooney's much talked about bachelor life has seen many pretty faces tumble in and out of it. Until Amal Alamuddin came along and hooked him for good.

Hollywood's most good looking, most loved and most prolific confirmed bachelor George Clooney has fallen hook, line and sinker for a high profile human rights lawyer from Britain.

Recent developments in Clooney's love life have sent shockwaves through his legions of fans worldwide, because whoever thought this resolute-looking confirmed bachelor would ever settle down?

Before he found his Ms Right, Clooney dated a LOT of Hollywood stars, starlets, models and suchlike.

Take a look at Hollywood's most dreamy man's many loves, over the years.

Deedee Pfeiffer

Clooney dated actress Michelle Pfeiffer's sister Deedee in the 1980s briefly.

The actress is seen here arriving at the 51st annual ACE Eddie Awards on February 25, 2001, in Beverly Hills, California.

Please click NEXT for more.

After Pfeiffer, Clooney dated actress Kelly Preston from 1988 and moved in with her shortly after.

Preston, who has been married to John Travolta since 1991, had divorced actor Kevin Gage shortly before she started seeing Clooney.

While she was living with Clooney, he gave her a potbellied piglet named Max that he continued to care for until the pig died in 2006.

Talia Balsam, who is now married to Mad Men actor Jon Slattery, was the only woman Clooney married.

The couple got hitched on December 15, 1989 and parted ways four years later in September, 1993.

Clooney is believed to have resolved to never marry after this breakup since he felt he 'wasn't cut out for it' and he 'hadn't given Talia a fair chance.'

Shortly after his divorce, Clooney began a three-year relationship with actress Kimberly Russell, whom he met on the set of a martini commercial.

Russell was recently seen in Lee Daniels' Precious.

Clooney met Celine Balitran in Paris while filming the movie The Peacemaker in 1996.

They dated until 1999.

Balitran continued to work as a model, and was married to filmmaker David Rosenthal until their divorce in 2004.

The former couple is seen here at the Los Angeles premiere of The Peacemaker.

Clooney met actress Krista Allen on the sets of Confessions of A Dangerous Mind, his directorial debut, in 2002.

The couple dated on and off until their final breakup in 2006.

In 2010, Allen married British musician Mams Taylor, but they separated in August 2011.

She runs a blog called Veggie Boom Boom.

Clooney dated model Lisa Snowdon on and off for five years, before they finally ended it for good in 2006.

Snowden is now a regular DJ for Capital Radio in London.

The former couple is seen here attending the gala black tie premiere of Ocean's Twelve in Hollywood on December 8, 2004.

Actress Renee Zellweger was linked to Clooney a number of times too.

The pair were first rumoured to have dated in late 2001, right before he started his turbulent romance with Krista Allen, and again in 2006 when the two were said to be together briefly.

But in 2007, they denied there was ever a romance and said that they've been just friends for over a decade.

George Clooney and Elisabetta Canalis confirmed they were dating after the latter was spotted on the back of George's motorcycle in July 2009.

The two dated for a little less than two years and broke up in June 2011.

Canalis, 35, is a model and a showgirl.
